sentences.en: A large group of undesirable strangers crashed her party.
sentences.cn: 一大群不受欢迎的陌生人不请自来，搅了她的聚会。

sentences.en: All this does not mean that the accumulation of capital is undesirable.
sentences.cn: 这一切并不意味着资本积累是不值得希求的.

sentences.en: Certain chemicals can induce undesirable changes in the nervous system.
sentences.cn: 有些化学物质能在神经系统中引起不良变化.

sentences.en: Certain estates are labelled as undesirable.
sentences.cn: 某些物业被归入不受欢迎之列。

sentences.en: I tried to avoid the back room where the undesirable elements were gathered.
sentences.cn: 我尽力避开后屋,那里聚集了讨厌的人.

sentences.en: In many applications a fluctuating DC current is undesirable.
sentences.cn: 在许多应用场合,波动的直流电是讨厌的.

sentences.en: In this way commission can act to prevent undesirable price discrimination.
sentences.cn: 通过这种方法,委员会就可以防止不适当的价格歧视.

sentences.en: Inflation is considered to be undesirable because of its adverse effects on income distribution.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀被认为是有害的，因为它会对收入分配产生不利影响。

sentences.en: It would be highly undesirable to increase class sizes further.
sentences.cn: 再增加班级人数，是大家都极不愿意的。

sentences.en: Plastic deformation and creep are highly undesirable, resilience is favourable.
sentences.cn: 塑性形变和蠕变是很不利的, 回弹性则是有利的.

sentences.en: That life is private and secluded from eruptions of undesirable strangers.
sentences.cn: 那种生活是闲静的,可以不受讨厌的局外人的打搅.

sentences.en: The third involves the undesirable externalities that may accompany productivity increases.
sentences.cn: 第三是伴随生产率提高而产生的不良的外部影响问题.

sentences.en: These so - called merits are often offset by its undesirable effects.
sentences.cn: 这些 所谓 的好处往往被鞭炮产生的不良后果抵消了.

sentences.en: They are the undesirable elements among the employees.
sentences.cn: 他们是雇员中的不良分子.

sentences.en: Undesirable consequences flow from these misconceptions.
sentences.cn: 这些误解造成了不良的影响。

sentences.en: Water in this area has been purified of undesirable chemicals.
sentences.cn: 这个地区水中的不良化学物质已清除掉了.

words.tran_cn: 令人不快地；不受欢迎地
不合需要；不受欢迎；不良；不愉快
不良分子；不受欢迎的人

trans.tran_cn: 不受欢迎的，讨厌的，不合需要的，不方便的，不良的
trans.tran_en: not welcome or wanted because they may affect a situation or person in a bad way

trans.tran_cn: 不受欢迎的人，不良分子
trans.tran_en: someone who is considered to be immoral, criminal, or socially unacceptable
